rooms.name: Goblin Lair
rooms.effect: Create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

rooms.name: Storeroom
rooms.effect: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

rooms.name: Dark Pool
rooms.effect: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

rooms.name: Fungi Cavern
